html:
Canon, which is one of the leaders in Digital Imaging, has announced a new lens for mirrorless cameras. This lens is aimed mostly at content creators as it is more affordable, compact and has an f/2.8 zoom option.

The RF16-28mm F2.8 IS STM lens is believed to deliver outstanding image quality whether it is for videos or still images and as a fast lens with not many technical demands, it can be a great one for beginners who wish to capture their creative vision. Besides, it is also believed to result in sharp details and rich colors which can help content creators produce better results.

The lens is designed to deliver the best results for both beginners and professionals including photographers of various genre, to shoot landscapes or intimate portraits. Besides, the lens is also compact and hence is portable, which means it is a great one for photographers and videographers who travel often.

Some technical features of the lens are:

  • Fast autofocus
  • Fixed aperture of f/2.8
  • Focusing distance of 20cm at 28mm and up to 0.26x magnification.
  • Control rings and mount joints sealed to provide dust, shock and drip resistance
  • 9-blade circular aperture to add a cinematic touch.
  • Weighs approximately 445g
  • Focus breathing correction for smooth video transitions which is a great feature for filmmakers
  • Advanced stabilizing systems for both stills and videos.
    • Peripheral stabilization to minimize distortion for wide angle shots.
    • Movie Digital stabilization for handheld or high speed shots.

The Canon RF16-28mm F2.8 IS STM Lens is available for pre-order and is scheduled to ship on February 11, 2025. The price is estimated to be about $1,149.00 and more information on this lens can be found here.
